summary: Adds a Basement to Breezehome with a full compliment of crafting and decorative pieces, and plenty of labeled storage. Also adds a Cavern under the basement with Ore veins of every and some enemies.
descriptionHtml:
ADDON IS IS FINALLY GOLD! 
OUT OF BETA PHASE, THANK YOU EVERYONE WHO GAVE INPUT! 
TRY IT OUT AND SEND ME SOME MORE FEEDBACK, PLEASE.

If you enjoy my addon please endorse to encourage continued support! 
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

- Patch Notes At Bottom - 
+ Patch #1 - 1/27/2013 
+ Patch #2 - 1/28/2013 
+ Patch #2.5 - 1/29/2013 
+ Patch #3 - 1/31/2013 (V 1.2) 
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

I originally made this for myself but realized it is actually pretty sweet, 
so here it is being uploaded in a WIP form to the workshop so I may 
get some feedback and whatnot from you guys and girls out there! 
This is my first mod for Skyrim other than some basic tutorial type things not worth posting. 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

-- ! Warning: This addon may conflict with other Breezehome altering mods, particularly the ones that move or remove the boxes and barrels under the stairs, that is the only place in the house my mod alters from the vanilla game, if the other addons do not alter this space there \'should\' be no conflict. ! --
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

Future Plans Include: 

° Quest Line: Clear the mine and discover the secrets buried deep below. 
° Mine Expansions! 
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

FEATURES INCLUDE: 

Hand crafted player owned interior space 

Multiple labeled containers for easy item storage based on type 

° Light Armor 
° Heavy Armor 
° Raw Food 
° Cooked Food 
° Fruits 
° Vegetables 
° Enchanting Materials 
° Potions 
° Crafting Materials 
° And More 

Three fully functional Mannequins 

One of each of the crafting \"tables\" 

° Forge 
° Tanning Rack 
° Grinding Wheel 
° Smelter 
° Workbench 
° Enchanting Table 

Custom books to be added in frequently with usefull topics and player hints! 

Powerful enchanted blacksmith apparel to help forge that next great piece!

______________________________________________________________________________ 

///////////////////////////////////////////////
Patch #1: 1/27/2013 
///////////////////////////////////////////////

(+) ORE IS IN! Kinda... Some veins are bugged, working on why. Manually mine for now. Sorry!
(+) Navmeshed Basement, so followers can be annoying down there too! 
(+) Replaced ugly wood \'grate\' under waterfall with pretty metal one 
(+) Replaced ugly dirt bridge in waterfall hub with a nicer stone one 
(+) Removed alot of pointless clutter in caverns 
(+) Added tons of detail objects to caverns 
(+) Readjusted Caverns lighting to provide more atmosphere 
(+) Added table with goodies in the entryway to the Caverns. (Light Scrolls, Pickaxe, ETC.) 

///////////////////////////////////////////////
Patch #2: 1/28/2013 
///////////////////////////////////////////////

(+) Extended Caverns a bit further near waterfall 
(+) Beginning work on adding in all ore veins and final clutter 
(+) More lighting tweaks 
(+) Begun adding sound markers and ambiance (drips, wind, etc) 

///////////////////////////////////////////////
Patch #2.5: 1/29/2013 
///////////////////////////////////////////////

(+) Added exit to cave which brings you outside Whiterun to the East. 
(+) Lighting tweaks 
(+) More minor geometry clean up 
(+) All ore veins are in place and should have proper function now 
(+) Added loot chests 
(+) More detail objects 

///////////////////////////////////////////////
Patch #3: 1/31/2013 
///////////////////////////////////////////////
(+) OUT OF BETA!! 
(+) Added enemies 
(+) fully navmeshed Caverns 
(+) Created scripted routines to randomize encounters 
(+) Minor geometric bug fixes 
(+) MORE lighting tweaks, MUAHAHA :tongueface: 
(-) There may be some visual bugs relating to Bandits mining ore, I am working on fixes, they are dumb Bandits, that is all. 
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

Thanks for checking out my addon, leave me some comments below about what I can do 
to better fine tune my addon in the future! 

I love constructive criticism! 

-KylleX
author: KylleX
